intro: Schefferomitra, commonly known as the ghost orchid, is a rare and enigmatic plant belonging to the Orchidaceae family. The plant is epiphytic, meaning it grows on other plants without deriving nutrients from them. Schefferomitra thrives in humid, shaded environments, typically found in the tropical and subtropical regions of Southeast Asia.
